full_threads.body:
Hi,

Thank you for your email.

To clarify a few things please remove only the skin care products from the shop (and replace with the files I send you). Please do not remove anything else (leave everything else as is).

Please return the links (for a stripe payment) of both the Consultation and Surgical booking (with the photo of Dr Jack Zoumaras).

So we need the two photos and links for payment (via stripe) back as they were please.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Kind Regards,

Maria Zoumaras

General Manager



Dr Jack Zoumaras PLASTIC SURGEON

Address Suite 3/300 Oxford Street, Bondi Junction NSW 2022

P: 02 9327 1700 | F: 02 93625460

Email: info@artisteplasticsurgery.com.au info@artisteplasticsurgery.com.au

Website: http://artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/

full_threads.body:
Hi Mary,

Thank you so much for your lovely message, we really appreciate it!

We've now uploaded the updated product range, including all the new files you shared. Everything is live with pricing and descriptions added.

Here are a few examples for your reference:
  • Barrier Balance Lotion Cleanser (Doctor Babor) 150 ml
    View Product
  • The Cure Cream (Doctor Babor) 50 ml
    View Product
  • The Cure Gel Cream (Doctor Babor) 50 ml – $269
    View Product

We’ve also reinstated the Surgical Booking and Full Consultation products:
  • Surgical Booking
    View Product
  • Full Consultation
    View Product

Before we go ahead and remove the previous product listings from our server (especially the eBook), could you please have a quick look and let us know if everything looks good to go?

We’re still working on SEO-optimising the product images and will keep you posted once that’s complete.

For the paylink, I’ll connect you with our senior developer Joel who can assist further with this.

Also why is the shop going to "pay link"

It should be Stripe



Dr Jack Zoumaras

Address Suite 3, Level 2, 300 Oxford St Bondi Junction NSW 2022

P: 02 9327 1700 | F: 02 93625460

Email: info@artisteplasticsurgery.com.au info@artisteplasticsurgery.com.au

Website: http://artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/

Thank you so much for sending through your request. Just letting you know that the updates have now been made and are ready for you to take a look at.
